Articles.Content: are there any mods that fit the round 2.5m modules in a plane cockpit configuration?

You could rescale any of them if you wanted to ?

EDIT- Also FantomWorks [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T00:06:29Z" title="05/17/2015 12:06  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

[Kerbal Aircraft Expansion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-1-0-2-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-5) has some 2.5 meter airplane cockpits.

EDIT: So does [Stock Extension](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-15FEV15-KSC-v3), although it is not updated yet so some parts may need adjustments before they work properly in 1.0.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T00:01:18Z" title="05/17/2015 12:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by Hotaru**
